set(THIS_PROJECT strophe)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_Root
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/auth.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/common.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/conn.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/ctx.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/event.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/handler.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/hash.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/hash.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/jid.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/md5.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/md5.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/ostypes.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/parser.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/parser_expat.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/sasl.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/sasl.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/sha1.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/sha1.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/snprintf.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/sock.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/sock.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/stanza.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/thread.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/thread.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/tls.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/tls_schannel.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/util.c
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/src/util.h
	../../SDKs/libstrophe/strophe.h
)


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/libstrophe )
include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/expat-2.1.0/lib )

# assume expat will be a static library
add_definitions(-DXML_STATIC)

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} STATIC ${SOURCES})

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
